Technique: DOVETAIL (JOINT); WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Papyrus fragment
Description: This small fragment of Coptic papyrus numbers, on 14 lines, a list of carpenters tools. They are a saw, an axe, an adze, a sharp plane, a chisel and a box for tools. The papyrus dates from the 5th or 6th century.
